about.description: Symbolic Geometric Algebra/Calculus package for SymPy. BSD License.
about.summary: Symbolic Geometric Algebra/Calculus package for SymPy.

name: galgebra
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "galgebra" %}
{% set version = "0.4.4" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/pygae/{{ name }}/archive/v{{ version }}.zip
  sha256: 87a9341dac51d4a81e1d4ccad9f0a96cc6a9dc9cbc4a1235c2872c210275bc54

build:
  number: 0
  script: python -m pip install --no-deps --ignore-installed .

requirements:
  host:
    - python
    - pip   
  run:
    - python
    - sympy

test:
  imports:
    - galgebra

about:
  home: http://galgebra.readthedocs.io
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'Symbolic Geometric Algebra/Calculus package for SymPy.'

  description: |
    Symbolic Geometric Algebra/Calculus package for SymPy. BSD License.
  doc_url: http://galgebra.readthedocs.io
  dev_url: https://github.com/pygae/galgebra

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - utensil
    - hugohadfield
